seo.title: AI Document Extraction & Report Builder
seo.description: Automate document processing and report generation with AI agents. Extract data from any source, build custom reports from reusable templates.

hero.headline: AI Agents for Document Processing and  Report Generation
hero.subheadline: Dodonai XD Agents extract data from any document source and create accurate, custom, and reusable reports from your custom templates.

educationalContent.heading: Dodonai XD: AI Intelligent Document Processing and Report Generation
paragraphs: Dodonai XD simplifies document processing and report creation. Create reusable templates that specify the data type and format you need. Dodonai's advanced AI seamlessly extracts, organizes, and formats data from any combination of source documents.

useCases.heading: How Can I Use Dodonai XD?

cards.title: Legal
cards.description: Extract and record data from common forms and contracts, organize discovery responses and objections, extract and organize evidence from discovery documents, and much more.

cards.title: Health
cards.description: Extract common data from medical records and automate medical record reviews.

cards.title: Insurance
cards.description: Rapidly process and compile comprehensive claim reports, policy analyses, and underwriting documents, streamlining operations and reducing manual effort.

cards.title: Business Analysis
cards.description: Swiftly develop detailed, precise analysis reports and business intelligence summaries, enabling more strategic decision-making.

cards.title: Operations
cards.description: Automate routine operational and performance reporting, improving accuracy, consistency, and overall productivity.

additionalContent.heading: How is Dodonai XD different?
paragraphs: Dodonai intelligently automates data extraction, sorting, and formatting through user-defined templates, significantly reducing manual reporting time. It uniquely allows interactive adjustments post-generation, ensuring precise final reports.

additionalContent.heading: Why switch to AI-driven document processing?
paragraphs: Manual processing is error-prone, repetitive, and time-consuming. Traditional intelligent document processing is too expensive for most tasks. Dodonai eliminates these inefficiencies by automating complex data handling tasks, drastically increasing productivity and accuracy, at a cost that is appealing for automating most document tasks.

howItWorks.title: Create Your Report Template
howItWorks.description: Define the structure, sections, data types, and formats you require.

howItWorks.title: Select Your Source Documents
howItWorks.description: Easily select relevant documents to populate each section of your template.

howItWorks.title: Run the Extraction
howItWorks.description: Dodonai XD agents automatically extract the templated data from the source documents. Easily adjust extracted data directly within the platform and export your finalized report.

valueProposition.heading: Benefits of Dodonai's AI Document Processing

cards.title: Time Efficiency
cards.description: Automate report creation to save hours each week.

cards.title: Accuracy & Consistency
cards.description: Reduce human errors with AI-driven data extraction.

cards.title: Fully Customizable
cards.description: Adapt templates precisely to your data and reporting needs.

cards.title: Easy Integration
cards.description: Direct integration with existing document management workflows.

cards.title: Human-in-the-Loop
cards.description: Optional post-generation editing ensures precise and refined outcomes.

cards.title: AI-Powered Summarization
cards.description: Immediate, actionable insights from complex documents.

faq.question: Can report templates be reused?
faq.answer: Yes, templates are designed for repeated use, significantly speeding up routine data extraction and reporting tasks.

faq.question: Is the generated content editable?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Dodonai XD enables easy adjustments within generated reports to meet exact requirements.

faq.question: How secure is my data?
faq.answer: Dodonai ensures stringent encryption, compliance with HIPAA guidelines and alignment with SOC 2, and rigorous data security practices.

faq.question: Does Dodonai support integration with other document management systems?
faq.answer: Yes, Dodonai can seamlessly integrates into many document management platforms and workflows - let us know which one you work with and, if we don't already integrate with them, we can explore integration.

testimonials.quote: "Dodonai's medical records summaries are the same quality as what I used to pay $800 for elsewhere."
testimonials.author: Justin Wilmers

testimonials.quote: "The medical records summary tool is a definite force multiplier for my practice."
testimonials.author: Anthony
